definition: Sherlock Holmes, 歇洛克·福爾摩斯|歇洛克·福尔摩斯[Xie1 luo4 ke4 · Fu2 er3 mo2 si1]
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

pinyin: Xie1 luo4 ke4 · Fu2 er3 mo2 si1

sentences.english: Holms is somehow a strange person.
sentences.chinese: 福尔摩斯是某种奇怪的人。

sentences.english: Doyle insisted his finishing off Holmes was a "justifiable homicide".
sentences.chinese: 道尔坚持自己终结福尔摩斯的生命是有理有据的。

sentences.english: Holmes and I had been sharing room in Baker Street for some years.
sentences.chinese: 我和福尔摩斯已经在贝克街共居多年了。

sentences.english: Done about the same time as the bell-rope?" remarked Holmes."
sentences.chinese: “这是跟拉铃索同时做好的吗？”福尔摩斯问。

sentences.english: Holmes went down on one knee,and put his ear to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 福尔摩斯单膝跪着，把耳朵贴在地面上。

sentences.english: The police is baffle and sherlock holm is call in to investigate.
sentences.chinese: 警方被难住了，于是请福尔摩斯前来侦查。

sentences.english: Holmes was partial to cocaine, while Brett needed lithium.
sentences.chinese: 福尔摩斯偏爱可卡因，而布雷特则需要锂盐。

sentences.english: Holmes chuckled and wriggled in his chair, as was his habit when in high spirits.
sentences.chinese: 福尔摩斯在椅子上扭动着身子，大笑不止。

sentences.english: Do you know what this is, Holmes?
sentences.chinese: 福尔摩斯，你知道这是什么吗？

sentences.english: Holms and Watson sat with the light on for half an hour.
sentences.chinese: 福尔摩斯和沃森坐着，让灯亮了半个小时。

sentences.english: 'Well, I got the number of the taxi, 'said Holmes.
sentences.chinese: “哼，我记下车号了，”福尔摩斯说道。

sentences.english: Today, there is no longer a copyright on the name Sherlock Holmes.
sentences.chinese: 今天，再没有关于夏洛克福尔摩斯名字的版权问题了。

sentences.english: Immediately Holmes jumped up from the bed and struck a match .
sentences.chinese: 福尔摩斯立即从床上跳起，划燃一根火柴。

sentences.english: "Sherlock Holmes" is the world's ever-popular classics.
sentences.chinese: 《福尔摩斯探案集》是全世界畅销不衰的经典名著。

sentences.english: He's said to be China's answer to Sherlock Holmes.
sentences.chinese: 他被认为是中国的福尔摩斯。

sentences.english: I was interviewing Holmes for the Times Sunday supplement.
sentences.chinese: 这天我正在为时代周日杂志的增刊采访福尔摩斯。

definition: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle (1859-1930), author of the Sherlock Holmes stories 歇洛克·福爾摩斯|歇洛克·福尔摩斯
master sleuth/lit. miraculous detective/cf Sherlock Holmes 福爾摩斯|福尔摩斯[Fu2 er3 mo2 si1] or Di Renjie 狄仁傑|狄仁杰[Di2 Ren2 jie2]

pinyin: A1 jia1 sha1 · Ke4 li3 si1 di4

definition: Harry Potter, boy wizard in the novels by J.K. Rowling 羅琳|罗琳

pinyin: Xie1 luo4 ke4 · Fu2 er3 mo2 si1
